-rEqva mRuqtyOd^^rdhaqttE &vAq&nnAdya(gm)# rundhEq nama#stEq hara#sE SOqciShaq ityA#ha namaqskRutyaq hi vasI#yA(gm) samupaqcara#ntyaqnyaM tE# aqsmat ta#pantu hEqtayaq ityA#haq yamEqva dvEShTiq tama#sya SuqcA&rpa#yati pAvaqkO aqsmaBya(gm)# SiqvO BaqvEtyAqhAnnaqM ~Mvai pA#vaqkO&nna#mEqvAva# rundhEq dvAByAqmadhi# krAmatiq 
prati#ShThityA apaqsya#vatIByAq(gm)q SAntyai$ || 18 
(Su - gvE#taqsO#&pA - ma#ShTAqBirvi ka#r.Shatiq - nAnta - rEkAqnna pa#~jcAqSacca#) (A4)
